body: I need clean translated version of this

Damn, I have jerked off to the original doujin scans countless times and comparing the old version to the new digital one is like night and day. 
I sure hope someone puts the translated English text into this one.
TBH this is a better scanned version
why the fuck does this need to be reposted again, like FOUR YEARS LATER?  Stupid shitbags.
